metadata.title: Regrets Always Lie in the Past

tracks.text: Muscular arms and abs also bear scars.
Sunraku wears only blue shorts and a blue bird mask.
Red text appears, Shangri-La Frontier. Beyond the text is an expanse of mountains, forests, plains, and cities. We zoom out and the expanse is reflected in VR goggles worn by Rakuro
At night, Sunraku stands in a misty field
Pencilgon stands on a cliff in front of the moon, her hands on her hips.
Moon light shines over Sunraku as he stands near large rocks.
Rakuro smiles. His image glitches into Sunraku, whose brow furrows
Pencilgon, a woman with long purple hair, twirls a spear in a forest.
Katzo, a girl with blond pig tails, walks forward. Looking away from us, she puts her hands on her hips.
Psyger-0 swings a log. Emul wears a suit and top hat. She leaps and is replaced by her human form.
Vysache wears an eye patch. He holds a carrot shaped smoking pipe and sits cross legged in a low lit, traditional Japanese room
Orcelot, wearing armor and a purple cape, sits on a box in a storage room.
Lycagon bears fangs over a forest, backdropped by a red moon. Yellow lines shine around her red, glowing eyes.
Sunraku runs through the woods. He leaps, and crosses in front of a full moon.
Flying through the air, he kicks and punches goblins. Holding red twin knives, he cuts at more goblins.
With red glowing fists, the blond girl fires energy blasts at goblins. Pencilgon strikes human sized wasps. They fight back to back.
Vysache, with a scar over his right eye, slowly opens his eyes.
Pencilgon strikes with a sword. Katzo punches with a fire ball.
The knight strikes the ground, and the ground explodes with brilliant light that fades to lightning.
A town of small red houses and rabbit shaped motifs. A large temple rests at the top of a giant tree.
The town fades into the bird man's red eye
Emul leaps up, smiling.
In a forest glowing with a red mist, Katzo, Sunraku, and Pencilgon walk side by side.
In UniteRounds, Pencilgon smiles. Text, 12, Regrets Always Lie in the Past.
Iron prisms covered in circuitry float around above them.
They enter a large, gymnasium sized chamber.
An iron pyramid crashes. They dodge. The pyramid is covered in red circuits
It lifts up and spins around. Red label, Suppression Drone, Type: Pyramid
Sunraku and Emul exchange glances. He folds his arms, straightens, and cocks an eyebrow
Pyramid approaches.
Katzo punches the pyramid, her fists glowing red
3 more pyramids descend
Katzo smiles
Katzo cocks her head and stares blankly
The three walk
A deep, dark hole
Katzo jumps
He taps his fist in his palm
Sunraku's temple throbs, metaphorically
Sunraku grabs Emul and leaps into the hole
Katzo stands in a cave. Sunraku and Emul slide down a crack in the wall.
Label, Tearlight Lake
The 2 cast lines into the water. The lake glows etherally in the stone cave, with a forest of stalactites dangling above them.
Label, Lifestide Salmon
A long green serpent with red eyes and gills on either side of the head
Katzo hands glow red
The serpent lunges at the shore. The trio dodge.
Embers warm in the fire
Bilac wipes sweat off her face
A purple blade rapier with a twisted gold and silver hilt. A silver dagger with a twisted purple hilt.
He picks up the blades
The rapier
He uses Spiral Edge on the serpent, leaving a purple and red circle on the body
Katzo red fist punches the serpent
She backflips away
Emul hides behind a rock. The serpent's wound glows purple.
Text, Corrosive Poison
Katzo punches the serpent's face
Katzo's hands glow black
She leaps and black fist punches the purple wound.
The serpent reels back and screams
She runs, carrying a book
Katzo runs
The serpent leers then lunges
The serpent screams in a torrent of attacks from the trio
The lake lies still in the cave. Sunraku, Level up, 31 arrow 32. Katzo, level up, 25 arrow 29
His eyes bulge and he squeezes Emul
Sunraku stomps off. Emul pants.
A tie down rope is anchored to the floor of the cave. The trio sit on a rug in a tent. Pencilgon enters.
Thin red flower petals flutter around an old, bare, gnarled tree, cast in red light.
Its few branches stretch up, with the tip of the highest touching the full moon.
A translucent woman sits on a root. She has brown hair in a braid that reaches her stomach. She wears casual, real world clothes.
She sings, Into the gap between moments, spills a single wish.
The wind rustles her hair. She opens her brown eyes.
Dozens of red spider lilies sway. Each plant has 6 long, thin crimson petals. Long stamen rise from the center, with a yellow, round anther at the end.
Rakuro floats, as if in water. Debris floats around him.
He reaches out a hand. The debris glitters.
He opens his blue eyes. He has short, spiky blue hair.
Pixels float in cyberspace. We follow a tunnel of light
Grass blows before an orange sunset.
Sunraku, bearing Lycagon's Mark, stands.
Rei opens her brown eyes. She has short brown hair that wraps around her face.
Sunraku walks on a path with Emul, a white bunny wearing a blue coat, red vest, and top hat. Emul twirls and back flips.
Surrounded by stone columns, Psyger-0, a knight appears. Her armor is white and lined in gold. Her helmet bears a long, red plume.
Arthur Pencilgon, a woman with long purple hair, looks determined. Her hair moves gently in the wind.
Katzo looks up. She has shoulder length hair tied up in pig tails.
Sunraku stares up as clouds roll over a blue sky. It glows yellow with a sunset, then darkens to a dark purple moon.
His bird mask feathers blows in the wind.
Pencilgon stands on a cliff in front of the moon, her hands on her hips.
Katzo crouches on a outcropping, in front of the moon
Sunraku and Psyger-0 stand, facing opposite directions, surrounded by floating debris, backdropped by a nebula that glows prismatically from red to green to blue.
Blue pixels float in cyberspace as we fly through a tunnel of light
Text, Animalia Expedition, Monster-Bird of the Forest Grotto, The "Rabbit Eared Shoebill" Really Exists
A human foot print
A large, shadowy figure flies between 2 trees.
Sunraku and Katzo walk behind them
